name: IKWUDLLD!
description:
I know what you did last Ludum Dare!

Teenagers Sammy, Kay, Henry, Molly and Andy are spending their weekend at abandoned asylum.

They did not know that they were not destined to return home...

Ludum Dare 50 page: I Know What You Did Last Ludum Dare! | ldjam.com | Ludum Dare game jam

How to play:

Left click - choose a character

Right click - order to move

Try to stay alive as long as you can

!!!ATTENTION!!!

Web version got a scaling problems, so windows version is preferably.

Share your high score in the comments!
